roleset.name: increase
roleset.note: MULTIPLY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'multiply' based on sentences in wsj and automaticexpansion via verbnet.I'm rather doubting now that start and end points will be mentioned,making this verb more analogous to the 'mathematics' sense of 'add'than the 'increase' set of verbs. (from multiply.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: amount increased by, EXT or multiplicand

example.name: mathematical
example.text: But he cautioned that Westmoreland's third quarter is typically better than the fourth, so investors ``shouldn't just multiply the third quarter by four'' and assume the same rate of improvement can be sustained.

example.name: careful with passives
example.text: [The uncertainty]-1 was multiplied *trace*-1 by the persistent strength of the dollar, traders said.
example.arg: by the persistent strength of the dollar

example.name: also ergative
example.text: But [such highly leveraged transactions]-1 seemed *trace*-1 to have multiplied this year, casting a pall over much of the junk market.
example.arg: casting a pall over much of the junk market
